name: Founder Focus Stack
tagline: Run your startup from a lean, AI-first productivity stack.
description: A curated set of AI tools that help founders stay on top of email, ship faster, understand their market, and communicate clearly with investors and teams.

name: Deep Work Dev Stack
tagline: Code faster, ship safer, and understand large codebases with AI.
description: An AI-native toolkit for developers: from code assistants and AI IDEs to code search, reviews, and documentation. Designed to accelerate deep work and reduce friction in daily coding.

name: Creator Studio Stack
tagline: Turn ideas into scroll-stopping images, videos, and posts.
description: A modern creator's studio in the browser: AI image and video tools, script and copy helpers, and distribution tools for YouTube and social media.

name: Student Study Stack
tagline: Study faster, write better, and keep up with readings.
description: A focused stack for students and lifelong learners: AI writing assistants, research tools, and reading companions to manage lectures, papers, and projects.
